jdbcService.sql: update component set db_modified_utc = timezone ('UTC', current_timestamp), name = case when :name is null then name else :name end, component_template_id = case when :componentTemplateId is null then component_template_id else :componentTemplateId end, parent_id = case when :parentId is null then parent_id else :parentId end, component_action_id = case when :componentActionId is null then component_action_id else :componentActionId end where id = :id
